title: HoP 156 - Sarah Pessin on Jewish Neoplatonism
itunes:title: HoP 156 - Sarah Pessin on Jewish Neoplatonism
description: Peter chats with Sarah Pessin about the Neoplatonism of Jewish philosophers such as Isaac Israeli, Ibn Gabirol, and Maimonides.
